item.title: Tattling and Threats
item.description: Certain behaviors our kids display can really wind us up. In this episode, Janet offers a solution to three common ones. First, tattling—when our kids seem to have the incessant need to tell on friends or siblings for every minor thing they do. As adults, we might label this person as a gossip and steer clear. As parents, we might fear it could eventually lead to our child being alienated from his peers... Feed: https://rss.art19.com/respectful-parenting-janet-lansbury

item.title: Ask, Tell, Confess: Hailee Tries FB Dating
item.description: Hailee logs on to Facebook to find love and...wow. She shares her story, and Bunnie & Meme have some things to say. Watch Full Episodes & More: www.dumbblondeunrated.com See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
